verses.text: \w The|strong="H2372"\w* \w message|strong="H4853"\w* \w seen|strong="H2372"\w* \w by|strong="H5030"\w* \w the|strong="H2372"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Habakkuk|strong="H2265"\w*. (Habakkuk)

\w How|strong="H5704"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w*, \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H3467"\w*! \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w*, ‘\w Violence|strong="H2555"\w*!’ \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w help|strong="H3467"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w make|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H5999"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w trouble|strong="H5999"\w*? \w Destruction|strong="H7701"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* eyes, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* fighting \w and|strong="H7200"\w* quarrelling.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w weak|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* rendered; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w surround|strong="H3803"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w perverted|strong="H6127"\w*. (The Lord)

\w Look|strong="H7200"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w look|strong="H7200"\w* well, \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w shocked|strong="H8539"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w amazed|strong="H8539"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w about|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w do|strong="H6466"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w work|strong="H6467"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*; \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* believe \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w told|strong="H5608"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H1980"\w* \w about|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* grim \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w quick|strong="H4116"\w* \w of|strong="H4908"\w* action \w who|strong="H3588"\w* sweep \w over|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* whole \w breadth|strong="H4800"\w* \w of|strong="H4908"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w seize|strong="H3423"\w* \w dwellings|strong="H4908"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* own.
\w They|strong="H1931"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* terror. \w They|strong="H1931"\w* write \w their|strong="H3318"\w* own rules.

\w Their|strong="H7043"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w are|strong="H5483"\w* \w swifter|strong="H7043"\w* \w than|strong="H7043"\w* \w leopards|strong="H5246"\w*, quicker \w than|strong="H7043"\w* \w wolves|strong="H2061"\w* hunting \w at|strong="H6153"\w* dusk. \w From|strong="H7350"\w* \w afar|strong="H7350"\w* they \w come|strong="H7350"\w* \w swooping|strong="H2363"\w* \w down|strong="H5774"\w*, \w like|strong="H5483"\w* an \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w* attacking its prey.

\w They|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* come \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w violence|strong="H2555"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w horde|strong="H4041"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* desert \w wind|strong="H6921"\w*, \w they|strong="H3605"\w* gather \w up|strong="H4041"\w* \w captives|strong="H7628"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* \w sand|strong="H2344"\w*.

\w At|strong="H4428"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H1931"\w* \w scoff|strong="H7046"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w princes|strong="H7336"\w* \w are|strong="H4428"\w* \w sport|strong="H7832"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w them|strong="H1931"\w*. \w They|strong="H1931"\w* \w laugh|strong="H7832"\w* \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w fortress|strong="H4013"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w heap|strong="H6651"\w* \w up|strong="H6651"\w* \w earth|strong="H6083"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w take|strong="H3920"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5674"\w* \w they|strong="H2098"\w* \w sweep|strong="H2498"\w* \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w like|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, Their \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w is|strong="H7307"\w* their god. (Habakkuk)

\w Are|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H7760"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eternal|strong="H6924"\w*, 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w one|strong="H6918"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*? 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w you|strong="H7760"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w appointed|strong="H7760"\w* \w them|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w execute|strong="H4191"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*, \w you|strong="H7760"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w established|strong="H3245"\w* \w them|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w punish|strong="H3198"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H7200"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w too|strong="H4480"\w* pure \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \w at|strong="H7200"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w condone|strong="H5027"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5999"\w*. \w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w regard|strong="H5027"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w treacherous|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w silence|strong="H2790"\w*, \w while|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w swallows|strong="H1104"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w upright|strong="H4480"\w*?

\w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w fish|strong="H1709"\w* \w of|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w like|strong="H3808"\w* reptiles \w that|strong="H7431"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w ruler|strong="H4910"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* wicked sweep \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w nets|strong="H2764"\w*, \w and|strong="H5927"\w* gather \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* drag-nets, \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* \w and|strong="H5927"\w* celebrate.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w net|strong="H2764"\w*, \w and|strong="H2076"\w* \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \w offerings|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* drag-net; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w nets|strong="H2764"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w portions|strong="H2506"\w* generous, \w and|strong="H2076"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w food|strong="H3978"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w rich|strong="H8082"\w*.

\w Will|strong="H1471"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w empty|strong="H7324"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w nets|strong="H2764"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*, \w slaughter|strong="H2026"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* unpityingly?
